---

**Exercise name**
What's it called?

**Description**
What does this exercise do? What muscles/areas does it target?

**Detection method**
How could we detect this with pose landmarks?
- [ ] Angle-based (joint angles)
- [ ] Position-based (landmark positions)
- [ ] Distance-based (landmark distances)
- [ ] Other

**Reference**
Any videos or images showing the exercise?

**Why this exercise?**
Why is it good for desk workers / developers?
